ygData.subject: RE: Strategies and quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I ve played an SK before....some of you may remember me from WAY back in the day when I was Vrathus on Cazic-Thule, but I only got to 11th before
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I've played an SK before....some of you may remember me from WAY back in the day when I was Vrathus on Cazic-Thule, but I only
got to 11th before deciding that being KOS was just not worth it.

First off, your weapon descriptions lead me to think that you are buying weapons at those levels, since it is my understanding that
a GZ isn't exactly easy to come by until about 35th level (with a group) and you have it listed as a 21-30 weapon. Also, Dark
Reavers are located in a very, very dangerous place, and I would imagine it takes a party of low-40s to get it.

Or is my view of things really skewed?

I'm guessing that the BBC is pretty much valueless -- seems that you can get by with a Combine 2HS or SBH until you hit the level
necessary for BIBS. Is there any real demand for the BBC?

I've tried looking at the various Web pages for info on the SK quests, but they are sorted by zone, and it is much more interesting
to me to see quests by class/race.

I'm also interested in finding faction breakdowns, etc.

Brian
